EmailTemplate.subject: Application for Licensure Update Submitted for {!CLQ_Program_Transaction__c.CLQ_Program__c}, {!CLQ_Program_Transaction__c.CLQ_Program_Number__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
You have successfully submitted an update to your application for licensure for {!CLQ_Program_Transaction__c.CLQ_Program__c}, {!CLQ_Program_Transaction__c.CLQ_Program_Number__c}. A copy of the updated application is attached to this email.
The Ohio Child Licensing and Quality System Team
This e-mail message, including any attachments, is for the sole use of the intended recipient(s) and may contain private, confidential, and/or privileged information. Any unauthorized review, use, disclosure, or distribution is prohibited.
ref: {!CLQ_Program_Transaction__c.Id}
